question: 激怒
sourceMnemonic: Being <kanji>fierce</kanji> and <kanji>angry</kanji> means you're filled with <vocabulary>rage</vocabulary>. If you were looking for a word to describe all your <vocabulary>indignation</vocabulary>, then this is it.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
